import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { ConferenceData } from '../../providers/conference-data'; @Component({ selector: 'page-speaker-list', templateUrl: 'speaker-list.html', styleUrls: ['./speaker-list.scss'], }) export class SpeakerListPage { speakers: any[] = []; constructor(public confData: ConferenceData) {} ionViewDidEnter() { this.confData.getSpeakers().subscribe((speakers: any[]) => { this.speakers = speakers; }); } } Social Workers Social Workers
